name: The Kingdom Project
description:
This is a short game where two kingdoms attack until there is a winner, watch the battle unfold as you fly around the battle field like a god. 

2-15mins average

Note: Larger the size of the world the greater the lag, advised to  remain between 50 - 100 for world size.

Controls

-WASD

-Mouse to look around   - Hold ESC to see mouse.

-Shift to go down, space to go up

Credit to: AurynSky and Rajat Verma for some of the art
